title: CHAIN BREAKER

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-When you break a chain, anybody who participated in said chain, and is currently alive in an ongoing game, they will be roleblocked the next night
-If they are not participating in a game, they will be roleblocked N1 the next game they participate in
-This role counts as breaking a chain. Anyone who participated in a chain in the roles channel before this role was made will be roleblocked N1 if this role spawns.
-Yes, this role was made to spite the “post” roles above this one
-You may attempt to start a chain, and may participate in one
-You will not be affected by your own ability

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Roleblock at least 5 people in one game.
